original_text: And he struck down an Egyptian, a handsome man. The Egyptian had a spear in his hand, but Benaiah went down to him with a staff and snatched the spear out of the Egyptian's hand and killed him with his own spear.
korean_text: 또 장대한 애굽 사람을 죽였는데 그의 손에 창이 있어도 그가 막대기를 가지고 내려가 그 애굽 사람의 손에서 창을 빼앗아 그 창으로 그를 죽였더라

sentences.original_text: And he struck down an Egyptian
The Egyptian had a spear in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그 이집트 사람은 손에 창을 들고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: but Benaiah went down to him with a staff
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 르나야는 막대기를 들고 그에게 내려갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and snatched the spear out of the Egyptian's hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이집트 사람의 손에서 창을 빼앗았습니다.

sentences.original_text: and killed him with his own spear
